content: this digital pdf pattern for a bulbasaur amigurumi crochet doll stands at approximately 3 15 inches or ~8cm tall when finished so from the base to the top of the head no physical doll will ship this is a digital instruction booklet for making your own this is an ad-free digital download of a pattern that can be found for free on my website at www 53stitches com the pattern includes 2 pdf documents one is a photo-tutorial of the pattern itself the other is a photo-tutorial document on the stitches and techniques used in the pattern for amigurumi beginners for this pattern you will need less than 1 small skein of each colour - 3 00mm crochet hook - polyester filling - 2x 10 00mm safety eyes - green yarn 8ply / dk - turquoise yarn 8ply / dk - scraps of teal yarn or teal felt - yarn needle - scissors the pattern is written in us terms and worked in continuous rounds
